body: What kind of request, I wonder. 1) Asks to get back together and have normal dates besides sex (happy end?) 2) Just be his sex friend (boring) 3) Knew she can use sex to asks for things from him. 4) Awakened to NTR and starts stealing people's boyfriend. 4th seems interesting, after all it gives her feeling of superiority over those popular girls like her ex's current girlfriend if she can make the guys can't live without her sex. She's actually the same type as those no-social-life gloomy male protagonists so normally she would have complex against them. The artist mentioned planning on releasing with the miko story, probably at new year, but have to delay this one. He seems to work on too many series at once in the Pixiv Fanbox.

Yes, it’s just the 続 in the title threw me off because the previous chapter also tagged with it. It’s like this is the sequel arc  (as in there should be another story before Kishida’s confession). Checked his Pixiv fanbox titles. Seems to be how he named the chapters between versions (such as no-text version). Doesn’t pay membership so I don’t know the content, but it has the 続 with seemingly the same content.
@minminazusa yeah it has a part 1, I read in English but I’m guessing you read in jap so here’s the code for it 380544
Damn I wonder what request she was going to ask him
What good pussy does to a mf
The title says "Continued - part 2". Is there any story before part 1 ? Checked the artist's tag, but there doesn't seem to be any, or is it just not uploaded?
In last panel : Kishida-kun, could you listen to my request? with「What is this feeling, I wonder」( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) hehe...
I mean in the first part she okay with that so....
Please girl, he just wants your body. Don't accept him again. But... It's up to author how he wants the story to continue I guess lol
